when_to_use.value: Adding text content to mobile application screens
Presenting headings, body copy, or display-level typography
Maintaining consistent typography across the mobile app

when_to_consider_else.value: Bulleted or numbered lists; use List component instead
Navigation copy in areas like bottom tab bars; apply Navigation text style directly instead
Web applications; use standard HTML heading and paragraph elements

content_considerations.value: Use headings to create clear content hierarchy
Body text should be used for general content and descriptions
Display text is for large, prominent content that needs emphasis
Maintain consistent use of text variants throughout the app

accessibility.value: Minimum paragraph spacing meets WCAG guidelines and follows WCAG SC 1.4.12 standards
Spacing can be increased but shouldn't decrease without accessibility consultation
Built on composite typography tokens combining multiple properties for consistency
Ensure proper heading hierarchy when using heading variants
Text should have sufficient color contrast against backgrounds
